action.action-desc: Mrs. Cammack introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To prohibit Federal funds from being made available to any law enforcement agency that employs an alien as a law enforcement officer, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Citizen-Only Police Act of 2025 or the COP Act of 2025.

section.header: Prohibition on availability of Federal funds
section.text: No Federal funds may be made available to any law enforcement agency that employs an alien as a law enforcement officer.
